page.title: 18OUR SCHOOL
page.content:
The children of{Merton}and{Huish } aged between 5 and 11 attend{The {Clinton School,Merton}together with children from Petersmarland and Petrockstow.There were 74 children attending this Church of England Primary School in July 1985.The children are taught in three classes.
Opened in 1962,the School is light and spacious.As well as the classrooms there is a large hall,a library and a general purpose room.Other facilities include a football pitch, two netball courts and a 10 metre swimming pool.
The School has a proud record of success in Football and Netball and in 1983 gained a Dolphin Trophy National Award for Progress in Swimming.The School's link with the {Coldstream {Guards}is greatly valued by everyone.
